article_title: Southcoast Health debuts state-of-the-art medical information system
article_text:
By Sandy Quadros Bowles

The Standard-Times

Posted Oct. 2, 2015 at 10:44 AM

Updated Oct 2, 2015 at 10:47 AM

article_metadata.description:
NEW BEDFORD — Southcoast Health has completed an epic journey to update its medical records.
Thursday marked the system-wide debut of a state-of-the-art electronic health record system across all of its sites. The software, created by Epic, will consolidate all of a patient’s medical information into a single record that can be securely accessed by a healthcare professional anywhere in the Southcoast Health system.
The system includes three hospitals, St. Luke’s Hospital in
article_metadata.author: Sandy Quadros Bowles The Standard-Times
